siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Introducing Minis, allowing users to add a game, a poll, or other interactive components directly into a room. Minis add to the current conversation, and offer new things to talk about. The first Minis include Polls, Would You Rather and Chosen At Random.
blogPost.body: Introducing Minis, allowing users to add a game, a poll, or other interactive components directly into a room. Minis add to the current conversation, and offer new things to talk about. The first Minis include Polls, Would You Rather and Chosen At Random.
blogPost.title: Soapbox Minis - Social audio just got a whole lot better, with mini games
blogPost.author: Dean Eigenmann

localize.description: 介绍一下Minis，允许用户在房间里直接添加游戏、投票或其他互动组件。迷你版增加了当前对话的内容，并提供了新的话题。第一批迷你版包括民意测验、你愿意吗和随机选择。
localize.tagline: 社交音讯变得更好了，有了小游戏。

localize.description: 介紹一下Minis，允許用戶在房間裏直接添加遊戲、投票或其他互動組件。迷你版增加了當前對話的內容，並提供了新的話題。第一批迷你版包括民意測驗、你願意嗎和隨機選擇。
localize.tagline: 社交音訊變得更好了，有了小遊戲。

previous.excerpt: Personas used by marketing, UX design and research are often based on assumptions or stereotypes. Akin lets you replace old personas with one survey. Create or upload a survey and segment, find trends and insights without hiring a data scientist or consultant.
previous.title: Akin - Replace personas with data driven clusters through surveys

localize.description: 营销、用户体验设计和研究中使用的角色通常是基于假设或刻板印象的。Akin可以让您用一个调查来替换旧的角色。创建或上传调查和细分，找到趋势和洞察力，而无需聘请数据科学家或顾问。
localize.tagline: 通过调查，用数据驱动的群组代替角色

localize.description: 營銷、用戶體驗設計和研究中使用的角色通常是基於假設或刻板印象的。Akin可以讓您用一個調查來替換舊的角色。創建或上傳調查和細分，找到趨勢和洞察力，而無需聘請數據科學家或顧問。
localize.tagline: 通過調查，用數據驅動的羣組代替角色

next.excerpt: Google Fonts gets new logo as catalog adds iconography, starting with Material Icons.
next.title: Google Fonts Icons - Google Fonts now supports icons

localize.description: Google Fonts获得了新的标志，因为目录中增加了图标，从Material Icons开始。
localize.tagline: 谷歌字体现在支持图标

localize.description: Google Fonts獲得了新的標誌，因爲目錄中增加了圖標，從Material Icons開始。
localize.tagline: 谷歌字體現在支持圖標
